name: steelheart-ai
description: AI-powered code review, documentation generation, and testing toolkit using Gemini AI

scripts.build: tsc && tsc src/setup.ts --outDir dist --target es2020 --module commonjs
scripts.review: npm run build && node dist/cli.js review
scripts.docs: npm run build && node dist/cli.js docs
scripts.test-gen: npm run build && node dist/cli.js test
scripts.setup: npm run build && node dist/cli.js setup
scripts.all: npm run build && node dist/cli.js all
scripts.postinstall: node dist/setup.js || echo 'Welcome to Steelheart AI! Run: steelheart setup to get started.'

author: Steelheart AI Team
